title: Grand Opening: Seoul Landmark Escape with Daily Breakfast, Free-Flow Drinks Hours & Club Lounge Access
description:
Myeongdong isn't just a neighbourhood, it's Seoul's beating heart. True to its Latin roots meaning 'to invite', voco Seoul Myeongdong, an IHG Hotel, welcomes you with front-row views of Namsan Tower and Gyeongbokgung Palace. The modern lobby is infused with Korean influences, designed to make every moment feel like an invitation to explore.

Step into a world where 'me time' gets an upgrade. Hit the total reset button at the indoor pool, and sample the restaurant's flavour-bomb food that mixes Korean and international tastes, all served with a side of calming mountain views.

The hotel's central location makes exploring seamless: get lost in Namdaemun Market or the COEX Mall, snack your way through tteokbokki (spicy rice cakes) and Korean fried chicken, or head to the outskirts and step back in time at Bukchon Hanok Village's traditional homes and the UNESCO-listed Jongmyo Shrine.
location_description: voco Seoul Myeongdong, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 52 Toegye-ro, Jung District, Seoul 04634, South Korea

title: Hilton VIP Lounge Access in Vibrant Seoul
description: Explore the vibrant capital city of South Korea with four nights at the Millennium Seoul Hilton, located right in the heart of this dynamic city. Enjoy exclusive executive lounge access, featuring a long list of benefits including daily breakfast, nibbles and snacks throughout the day, nightly free-flow alcoholic beverages and personalised check-in. You will also enjoy an incredible Japanese dinner for two, a take-away lunch while you explore the city and unwind with a nightly glass of wine each at the hotel's elegant wine bar the Oak Room
offer_address: 50, Sowol-ro, Jung-gu, Jung-Gu, 04637 Seoul, South Korea

title: Five-Star Seoul City Stay near The Hyundai Seoul with Rooftop Restaurant & Daily Breakfast
description: Bringing the best of five-star luxury and contemporary design to one of Seoul's most prestigious neighbourhoods, Yeouido, Fairmont Ambassador Seoul offers a city escape beyond all expectations. Just seconds away from the city’s largest department store, The Hyundai Seoul, this opulent destination offers panoramic views of the city, Han River and beyond from within its palace-inspired interiors. Secure one of the best spots in the house with a cocktail under the romantic glow of city lights at M29, or dive into an unforgettable meal at the modern European restaurant, Mariposa, located on the hotel's 29th floor. Punctuate days spent exploring Seoul with a rejuvenating treatment at ESPA at Fairmont.
offer_address: 108 Yeoui-daero, Yeongdeungpo-gu, Seoul 07335, South Korea

title: Bold Five-Star Seoul Stay with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Embrace the vibrant metropolitan culture of South Korea with an enticing stay at the chic five-star Mondrian Seoul Itaewon. Named in Trip Advisor’s Travelers' Choice Awards 2022 as the winner of the Top 25 Hotels in South Korea, this stylish Mondrian hotel is a spectacle for all the senses. Located in the lively Itaewon district, known for its global cuisine, vibrant nightlife and shopping, the hotel is perfectly perched to allow guests full immersion in the city’s historic and modern treasures.

Start with a visit to the nearby War Memorial of Korea or the striking N Seoul Tower, before returning to the hotel to savour a diverse collection of dining options, ranging from modern Italian cuisine at Cleo to creative cocktails at the rooftop Privilege. After days spent exploring Seoul’s famous shopping, dining and cultural districts, unwind in the invigorating sauna room, take a refreshing dip in the indoor pool or laze with a delicious cocktail in hand at Altitude Pool & Lounge as the sun sets over the buzzing city.
offer_address: 23 Jangmun-ro, Yongsan-gu 04392, Seoul, Korea

title: Sky-high Seoul Yongsan Escape near Han River with Indoor Pool & Onsite Dining
description:
Experience the dynamic energy of Seoul from a luxurious base located in the heart of the city's bustling Yongsan district. This sophisticated hotel offers easy access to the renowned Dragon Hill Spa, where you can soak in traditional Korean bathhouses, as well as the Yongsan Electronics Market, a haven for tech enthusiasts.

Relish in the hotel's array of amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a sprawling indoor pool. Savour authentic Korean cuisine at the onsite restaurant or venture out to the nearby Itaewon district, renowned for its diverse dining options and vibrant nightlife.
location_description: Novotel Ambassador Seoul Yongsan - Seoul Dragon City
offer_address: Cheongpa Ro 20 Gil 95, Yongsan Gu, Seoul, South Korea, 04372

title: Seoul Yongsan District Escape near Han River with Pool & Panoramic Restaurant
description:
Discover the vibrant spirit of Seoul with this urban retreat in the heart of Yongsan, one of the city’s most energetic districts. From this sleek and modern base, you’re perfectly positioned to explore nearby highlights like the buzzing shops of the Myeongdong district and the timeless grandeur of Gyeongbokgung Palace.

Dine your way around the world at Food Exchange, or take in sweeping skyline views with a meal at The 26. Whether you’re squeezing in a workout at the cutting-edge gym or enjoying a refreshing dip in the indoor pool, this is the perfect launchpad for your South Korean adventure.
offer_address: Cheongpa Ro 20 Gil 95, Yongsan Gu, Seoul 4372, South Korea

title: Sleek Five-Star Seoul City Escape in Yeouido Island with Sky-High Rooftop Bar, Indoor Pool & Luxe Spa
description: Step into an artistic world of contemporary luxury and timeless elegance at this towering Seoul hotel, ensconced in the bustling heart of Yeouido Island. Designed by world-renowned architect Sir Richard Rogers, regale in the sophisticated interiors of the hotel, unwind in your plush room, or indulge in a gastronomic journey at one of the hotel's three exquisite dining venues. Go for a swim in the indoor pool, pamper with treatments at the spa or enjoy a craft cocktail on the 29th-floor rooftop bar, while relishing panoramic city and Han River vistas. If you wish to explore, Yeouido Hangang Park and the shopping district of Mydeongdong are mere moments away.
offer_address: 108 Yeoui Daero Yeongdeungpo Gu, Seoul, 7335, South Korea

title: Modern Gangnam City Escape with High-End All-Day Dining Restaurant
description: Live your best life in the lively city of Gangnam at voco Seoul Gangnam, an IHG Hotel. This vibrant escape is the perfect retreat between excursions to the high-end restaurants, shiny fashion precincts and neon-lit nightlife of the city. Enjoy pillowy soft bao buns stuffed with crispy shrimp or signature saucy noodles at the all-day dining restaurant, Amarillo, before heading to the modern fitness centre to work up your appetite for dessert.
location_description: voco Seoul Gangnam, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 144 Dosan-daero, Nonhyeon-dong, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, 06040, South Korea

title: Five-Star InterContinental Seoul with Direct COEX Mall Access
description: Escape to the stylish InterContinental Seoul COEX, an IHG Hotel, ideally positioned in Seoul's renowned Gangnam district. Sleek rooms come paired with vistas of the vibrant city or Bongeunsa Temple, representing the traditional beauty of Korea. A rejuvenating wellness centre and three diverse restaurants present guests with an idyllic blend of indulgence and convenience - though the hotel's major draw is its direct connection to Asia's largest underground mall, COEX.
location_description: InterContinental Seoul COEX, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 524 Bongeunsa-ro Gangnam-gu, Seoul, 06164, Republic of Korea

title: Five-Star Lakefront Seoul City Break with Indoor Pool, Luxe Spa & Rooftop Bar
description:
Overlooking the tranquil waters of Seokchon Lake, this sophisticated Sofitel sanctuary brings together Parisian charm and the warmth of Korean hospitality. Located in the stylish Jamsil district, it offers sleek, contemporary rooms and apartments with sweeping views of Seoul’s skyline, plus a Parisian speakeasy-style rooftop bar perched on the 32nd floor, perfectly placed for evenings spent sipping carefully crafted drinks.

Indulge in French-inspired cuisine or modern Japanese dining, unwind at the serene spa, or soak up the lake views while swimming in the indoor pool. Just moments away, discover iconic attractions like Lotte World Tower, Seokchon Lake Park, and Olympic Park, all easily accessible thanks to the nearby metro, making it a perfect base for exploring the city.
location_description: Sofitel Ambassador Seoul Hotel & Serviced Residences
offer_address: 209 Jamsilro Songpagu, Seoul, South Korea, 05552

title: Sky-High Seoul Sanctuary in Gangnam District with Daily Michelin-Starred Breakfast
description: Experience elevated opulence in Seoul’s iconic Gangnam area from the awe-inspiring SIGNIEL Seoul, hidden within Lotte World Tower, South Korea’s tallest building and the sixth tallest in the world. Rise above it all as the elevator ascends to the gleaming 76th-floor lobby and enjoy incredible city vistas as you plunge into the 85th-floor swimming pool. Part of the Leading Hotels of the World collection, this glamorous launchpad exudes contemporary luxury and sophistication, with a location close to the Olympic Park and Seonjeongneung, home to the royal tombs. For Michelin-starred French fare, pull up a seat at the lauded STAY restaurant, savour contemporary Korean cuisine at the acclaimed BICENA, or sip champagne from Asia’s largest collection at the sky-high Bar 81.
offer_address: 300 Olympic-ro, Jamsil 6(yuk)-dong, Songpa-gu, Seoul, South Korea

title: Bold Five-Star Seoul Stay with Two Pools, Onsite Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
description:
Embrace the vibrant metropolitan culture of South Korea with an enticing stay at the chic five-star Mondrian Seoul Itaewon  This stylish Mondrian hotel is a spectacle for the senses: offering a unique, inspired blend of modern design and authentic Korean culture, the hotel teems with immersive spaces and experiences curated to elevate your Seoul adventure.

Take advantage of the hotel's prime location and explore the city's epic dining scene, historic attractions, buzzing shopping streets and vibrant nightlife. Return to a diverse collection of dining options, from modern Italian at Cleo to creative cocktails at the rooftop Privilege. After a long day of exploration, unwind with a swim in the indoor pool or cool off with a refreshing cocktail at Altitude Pool & Lounge as the sun sets over the Seoul skyline.
offer_address: 23 Jangmun-ro, Yongsan Gu, Seoul 04392, South Korea

title: Award-Winning Five-Star Seoul Luxury with Two Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Designer Mall
description:
There’s no better landmark of luxury than The Shilla Seoul. Having opened its doors over 40 years ago, with luxe renovations since then, it sets the standard for five-star living and time-honoured hospitality. Standing proudly on Namsan Mountain and surrounded by cascading traditional Korean buildings, the statuesque hotel sits among 23 acres of private wooded parkland and looks over Seoul’s commercial district. A must-visit property, The Shilla Seoul maintains a unique position as the first South Korean five-star hotel on the annual Forbes Travel Guide from 2019 through 2022.

While it may be the oldest luxury accommodation in the sprawling city, The Shilla Seoul is still as fresh as its younger counterparts, with world-class rooms and facilities. Spend your days rubbing shoulders with Seoul’s elite on the third-floor Urban Island, where heated pools, jacuzzis, cabanas and heated sunbeds sit among a rooftop garden. Should the weather turn,  visit Arcade, a 20-shop luxury mall with the likes of Hermès and Issey Miyake. However you spend your day, it should end at one of the hotel’s five restaurants. The top-floor La Yeon is the first Korean restaurant to earn two Michelin stars, while Palsun’s high-end Chinese has captured the hearts of locals, making it one of the most popular regional spots in the city.
offer_address: 249 Dongho-ro, Jangchung-dong, Jung-gu Seoul South Korea

title: Sky-High Novotel Seoul Escape near Dongdaemun Design Plaza with Rooftop Bar & Infinity Pool
description:
Find yourself captivated by the contemporary charms of this stylish urban oasis, perfectly placed in the heart of one of Korea's prime shopping districts, Dongdaemun. A short stroll from the historic Heunginjimun Gate and the bustling Dongdaemun Design Plaza, this five-star hotel is an ideal base for seeing the best of Seoul.

Relax and unwind in your well-appointed guest room, swim laps in the rooftop infinity pool or the heated indoor pool and cool off with well-crafted cocktails from the Roof Top Bar while soaking up the stunning city views. Plus, you can also dine on delectable Korean cuisine at Food Exchange and savour pastries from the Deli.
location_description: Novotel Ambassador Seoul Dongdaemun Hotels & Residences
offer_address: 238 Eulji-ro, Jung-gu, Seoul, 04561, South Korea

vendor_name: Grand Mercure Ambassador Hotel & Residences Seoul Yongsan
title: Contemporary Seoul Yongsan District Escape near Han River with Onsite French Restaurant, Spa & Indoor Pool
description:
Rising above the vibrant Yongsan district, this five-star address offers panoramic views of the Han River and Seoul’s glittering skyline. Each sophisticated room and suite features contemporary Korean design and is the perfect spot to rest your head after a long day of exploring this thriving city. Work up a sweat in the fitness centre, then have a soothing dip in the serene indoor pool and unwind in the sauna.

Dine on premium French-inspired cuisine at A La Maison Wine & Dine, an upscale eatery and wine bar. Visit the onsite spa for a decadent treatment, then get ready to discover Seoul. With a prime location near the Han River, you've got easy access via public transport to the National Museum of Korea and the leafy trails of Yongsan Family Park.
location_description: Grand Mercure Ambassador Hotel and Residences Seoul Yongsan
offer_address: Cheongpa Ro 20-gil 95, Yongsan Gu, Seoul 04372, South Korea

title: Seoul Yongsan District Hotel near Han River with Two Restaurants
description:
Explore the soul of South Korea from this modern stay, perfectly positioned in Seoul's dynamic Yongsan district. This stylish hotel offers easy access to the city's famed shopping district, Myeongdong, and the historic Gyeongbokgung Palace.

Savour a variety of global flavours at In Style Restaurant or keep up with your fitness routine at the state-of-the-art gym. For a slice of tranquillity in the city, head to the nearby Namsan Park, a lush urban oasis offering panoramic views of Seoul.
location_description: ibis Styles Ambassador Seoul Yongsan - Seoul Dragon City
offer_address: 95 Cheongpa-ro 20-gil, Yongsan District, Seoul, South Korea, 04372

title: Stylish Hongdae Stay Near Trendy Restaurants and Nightlife
description: Experience Hongdae’s vibrant underground music and arts scene from your base at Holiday Inn Express Seoul Hongdae, an IHG Hotel. Journey into this hip neighbourhood and stumble across talented street performers, challenge a friend to an arcade dance battle and take on the area’s after-hours fun. Back at the hotel, recharge with a coffee in the Great Room or head downstairs to the shopping mall located directly underneath the hotel.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Seoul Hongdae, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Aekyung Tower, 188 Yanghwa-ro, Mapo-gu, Seoul 04051, South Korea

title: Modern Seoul Riverside Oasis with Rooftop Infinity Pool & Five Restaurants & Bars
description:
Experience the vibrant west of South Korea's pulsing capital from an elegantly appointed base located beside the Han River. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's ultra-cool infinity pool bar on the 20th floor for an expertly crafted cocktail and panoramic views of the city and the river below, or simply retreat to a light-filled room equipped with all the modern amenities you could want.

Choose your flavour from different dining options, including the chic Restaurant VOISIN for French-inspired fare or Mapo Eight serving up freshly baked pastries and deliciously light meals. Fitness enthusiasts will love the well-equipped gym, while the indoor pool is the perfect space to soothe sore muscles.
offer_address: 8 Mapodaero, Mapogu, Seoul 04176, South Korea

title: Contemporary Seoul Stay in Neon-Lit Gangnam with Six Restaurants & Bars
description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of Seoul’s Gangnam district, where neon signs invite you to experience the city's dynamic nightlife, at this stay near Sinnonhyeon station. The hotel features a cutting-edge fitness centre, an indoor pool and four distinctive dining options, including a gourmet Korean Omakase restaurant, along with two bars.

Take a leisurely walk down the fashionable, tree-lined Garosu-gil, home to chic boutiques and trendy cafes, or explore the nearby COEX Mall, one of Asia's largest underground shopping destinations. After a day of adventure, relax at the onsite Gran A II Live Music Bar.
offer_address: 130 Bongeunsa-ro, Gangnam, Seoul 06124, South Korea

title: Seoul Hyatt Sky-High Elegance with Onsite Dining, Spa, Pool & Sauna
description:
Step into the sleek glass tower of Park Hyatt Seoul, where Korean elegance meets cosmopolitan sophistication. Unwind in minimalist rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows that frame the city's skyline like living artwork. Plunge into the indoor infinity pool suspended above the heart of Seoul, melt away stress in the spa, or get your heart pumping in the fitness centre.

Located in the heart of Gangnam District, you are close to high-end fashion at Apgujeong Rodeo Street and Starfield COEX Mall's endless entertainment. After diving into a wealth of cuisine at three signature restaurants, hop on the nearby subway to explore grand ancient palaces or bustling night markets like Dongdaemun Market.
offer_address: 606 Teheran-ro, Gangnam, Seoul 6174, South Korea

title: Contemporary Seoul City Break in the Heart of Gangnam City
description: Indulge in a true South Korean city experience at the contemporary InterContinental Grand Seoul Parnas, an IHG Hotel, ideally positioned in the centre of Gangnam, the buzzing heart of Seoul. Take in spectacular vistas of the vibrant city from the refurbished elegant rooms, make a splash in the indoor pool, or savour decadent cuisine at the hotel's bespoke restaurants.
location_description: InterContinental Grand Seoul Parnas, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 521 Teheran-ro Gangnam-gu, Seoul, 06164, Republic of Korea
